statements: SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE is_out_of_stock = TRUE
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity <= 10
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE is_out_of_stock = TRUE AND quantity < 5 ORDER BY quantity DESC, item_name ASC
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE is_out_of_stock = FALSE AND item_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY item_id DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity, is_out_of_stock FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 AND is_out_of_stock = FALSE ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_name NOT LIKE '%s' ORDER BY item_id ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY item_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, reason FROM inventory LEFT JOIN out_of_stock ON inventory.id = out_of_stock.item_id WHERE reason='Damage' ORDER BY item_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'S%' GROUP BY item_name HAVING total_quantity > 50 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, stock_quantity FROM InventoryItem;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLogs WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT log_description, log_date FROM InventoryLogs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, stock_quantity FROM InventoryItem WHERE stock_quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM InventoryUpdateHistory WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM InventoryItem WHERE stock_quantity >= 100 ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, stock_quantity, out_of_stock FROM InventoryItem WHERE out_of_stock = TRUE ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, stock_quantity FROM InventoryItem WHERE stock_quantity < 50 AND out_of_stock = FALSE ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLogs JOIN InventoryItem ON InventoryLogs.item_id = InventoryItem.item_id WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT item_name, updated_quantity, update_date FROM InventoryUpdateHistory JOIN InventoryItem ON InventoryUpdateHistory.item_id = InventoryItem.item_id ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE Quantity > 10;
SELECT ItemName, Quantity FROM Inventory WHERE OutOfStock = TRUE;
SELECT ItemID, ItemName, Quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY ItemName ASC;
SELECT UserID, UserName, UserRole FROM Users WHERE UserRole = 'Admin';
SELECT LogID, Action, LogTime FROM InventoryLogs ORDER BY LogTime DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT ItemName, Quantity FROM Inventory WHERE OutOfStock = FALSE;
SELECT UserID, UserName, UserRole FROM Users WHERE UserRole = 'Admin';
SELECT LogID, ItemID, Action, LogTime FROM InventoryLogs ORDER BY LogTime DESC;
SELECT i.ItemName, p.AccessLevel FROM Inventory i INNER JOIN Permissions p ON i.ItemID = p.UserID;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT item_name, in_stock FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, in_stock FROM inventory_items WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, in_stock FROM inventory_items WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT item_id, item_name, in_stock FROM inventory_items WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM inventory_updates ORDER BY updated_at DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role = r.role_id;
